RESUMEN AUTOMATICO

Resumen automático

'Neonatal' microcephaly potentially associated with 'ZIKV' infection has already caused a public health emergency of international concern. 'This' methylation step is crucial for 'ZIKV' replication cycle and evading the host immune 'system,' making it a target for drug design. 'This' 2 '\''-'O-MTase' activity is regulated by nsp10. 'To' unravel the regulation of 'nsp10/nsp16' 2 '\''-'O-MTase' 'activity,' we used purified 'MERS-CoV' nsp16 and nsp10. 'First,' we showed that nsp16 recruited 'N7-methylated' capped 'RNA' and 'SAM'. 'The' subsequent release of 'SAH' speeds up 'nsp10/nsp16' dissociation that stimulates the reaction turnover. 'IMPORTANCE' 'MERS-CoV' codes for a cap 2 '\''-'O-methyltransferase' that converts 'cap-0' into 'cap-1' structure in order to prevent virus detection by cell innate immunity mechanisms. 'We' report the biochemical properties of 'MERS-CoV' 2 '\'' 'O-methyltransferase,' which is stimulated by nsp10 acting as an allosteric activator of the nsp16 2 '\''-'O-methyltransferase' possibly through enhanced 'RNA' binding affinity. 'Conversely,' after cap 'methylation,' the reaction turnover is speeded up by 'cap-1' 'RNA' release and 'nsp10/nsp16' complex 'dissociation,' at the low intracellular 'SAH' concentration. 'These' results suggest that 'SAM/SAH' balance is a regulator of the 2 '\''-'O-methyltransferase' activity and raises the possibility that 'SAH' hydrolase inhibitors might interfere with 'CoV' replication cycle. 'Therefore,' 'JEV' 'MTase' is a potential target for antiviral therapy. 'The' mRNA cap 'structure,' which is added to nascent 'RNA' pol 'II' 'transcripts,' recruits the protein complexes required for 'pre-mRNA' transcript 'processing,' mRNA export and translation initiation. 'RNMT' 'Thr-77' phosphorylation provides a burst of mRNA cap methyltransferase activity during early 'G1' phase at a time when transcription is reactivated following completion of the cell cycle. 'The' crystal structure of the 'ZIKV' 'MTase' determined at a 2.01-'Å' resolution reveals a crystallographic homodimer. 'It' is urgent to develop antiviral strategies inhibiting the viral replication. 'We' show that silencing of transposons in the pericentromeric heterochromatin of 'Arabidopsis' thaliana requires 'SMC4,' a core subunit of condensins 'I' and 'II,' acting in conjunction with 'CG' methylation by 'MET1' ( 'DNA' 'METHYLTRANSFERASE' 1), 'CHG' methylation by 'CMT3' ( 'CHROMOMETHYLASE' 3), the chromatin remodeler 'DDM1' ( 'DECREASE' 'IN' 'DNA' 'METHYLATION' 1), and histone 'modifications,' including histone 'H3' 'Lys' 27 monomethylation ( 'H3K27me1),' imparted by 'ATXR5' and 'ATXR6'. 'SMC4/condensin' also acts within the mostly euchromatic chromosome arms to suppress conditionally expressed genes involved in flowering or 'DNA' 'repair,' including the 'DNA' glycosylase 'ROS1,' which facilitates 'DNA' demethylation. 'Two' highly pathogenic human coronaviruses associated with severe respiratory syndromes emerged since the beginning of the century. 20 compounds inhibiting the 'SARS-CoV' nsp14 were further evaluated by 'IC50' determination and their specificity was assessed toward 'flavivirus-' and human cap 'N7-MTases'. 'Gene' expression can be 'post-transcriptionally' regulated via dynamic and reversible 'RNA' modifications. 'Collectively,' our approaches reveal distinct classes of m1A methylome and provide a resource for functional studies of 'm1A-mediated' epitranscriptomic regulation. 'In' this 'regard,' the pbx family of homeobox genes has been found to heterodimerize with and thereby augment the 'DNA' binding activity of certain hox proteins on a subset of potential target sites. 'Since' pbx1a and pbx1b are differentially expressed in endocrine versus exocrine compartments of the adult 'pancreas,' our results illustrate a novel mechanism by which pbx proteins may modulate the expression of specific genetic 'programs,' either positively or 'negatively,' during development. 'The' 'C' terminus consists of most of the 'HOX' interacting transcription factor 'PBX1,' including its 'DNA-binding' homeodomain. 'Structure-function' correlative experiments have suggested that oncogenesis by 'E2A-PBX1' requires an activation 'domain,' called 'AD1,' at the extreme 'N' terminus. 'Circumstantial' evidence suggests that the side chain of 'L20' might interact with a deep hydrophobic pocket in the 'KIX' domain. 'Our' findings add to a growing body of literature indicating that interactions between 'CBP/p300' and transcription factors can function in a specific manner to modulate 'HAT' catalytic activity. 'An' interaction involving a region within the 'N-terminal' transcriptional activation domain of 'E2A-PBX1,' termed the 'PCET' 'motif,' which has previously been implicated in 'E-protein' 'silencing,' and the 'KIX' domain of the transcriptional coactivator 'CBP/p300,' critical for leukemogenesis. 'Global' transcriptional profiling studies have linked increased expression of 'ISG95' ( 'KIAA0082)' to response to interferon treatment and viral 'infection,' suggesting that it may be part of the cellular defense against viral replication. 'Recombinant' 'ISG95' shows 'RNA-' and 'S-adenosyl-methionine' binding and protein methyltransferase activity in vitro. 'HOX,' 'PBX1' and 'MEIS1' proteins have been shown to form hetero dimeric or trimeric complexes in different combinations. 'Cooperative' interaction between 'PBX1' and 'HOX' proteins enhances their 'DNA' binding 'specificity,' essential for 'HOX' dependent developmental programs. 'Anionic' nanoliposome administration reduced atherosclerosis in 'HFC-fed' 'Ldlr-/-' mice by promoting 'RCT' and upregulating the 'ABC-A1/ABC-G1' pathway. 'XXT1' and 'XXT2' have previously been shown to encode 'XyG' 'α-1,6-xylosyltransferases,' while knockout mutants of a 'third,' 'XXT5,' exhibit decreased 'XyG' 'content,' suggesting a similar activity. 'These' structures strongly support the 'SNi-like' reaction as the retaining mechanism for 'XXYLT1'. 'Epilepsy,' behavior 'problems,' 'and/or' intellectual disability require specific treatment and interventions. 'Surveillance:' 'Routine' monitoring of feeding and weight 'gain,' respiratory 'function,' 'strength,' and 'mobility;' annual or biannual monitoring for orthopedic and pulmonary 'complications;' cardiac monitoring for those with 'CMD' subtypes involving a risk for cardiomyopathy. 'LARGE1' and 'LARGE2' have different tissue distribution profiles and enzymatic 'properties;' 'however,' the functional difference of the homologs remains to be 'determined,' and 'α-DG' is the only known substrate for the modification by 'LARGE1' or 'LARGE2'. 'As' members of a large family of enzymes that transfer sugar groups from donor 'nucleotide-sugars' to acceptor 'substrates,' 'GlcAT1' and 'EXTL2' retain conserved 'GT' folds. 'Comparative' analysis of these structures reveals signature features for selecting specific donor sugars. 'Sequencing' of the primary candidate gene 'TBX10' did not reveal a 'disease-causing' variant. ( 'Arg277Gln),' we suggest mutation 'B3GAT3:p'. 'Glycosyltransferases' and glycoside hydrolases are two diversified groups of 'carbohydrate-active' enzymes ( 'CAZymes)' in 'existence,' they serve to build and break down the glycosidic 'bonds,' 'respectively,' and both categories have formed many 'sequence-based' families. 'Like' 'glycosyltransferases,' 'H3' binds 'UDP-glucose,' as shown by saturation transfer difference ( 'STD)' nuclear magnetic resonance ( 'NMR)' 'spectroscopy,' and this binding requires 'Mg(2+)' 'Mutation' of the 'glycosyltransferase-like' metal ion binding motif in 'H3' greatly diminished its binding to 'UDP-glucose'. 'STD' 'NMR' experiments using a heparin sulfate decasaccharide confirmed that 'H3' binds heparin sulfate. 'We' demonstrate that 'H3' binds the sugar nucleotide 'UDP-glucose,' as do glycosyltransferases. 'Nuclear' 'PA' enhances 'EGFR' 'expression,' a role compatible with the mitogenic ability of the phospholipid. 'Pregnane' 'X' receptor ( 'PXR)' mainly regulates xenobiotic metabolism and detoxification. 'If' 'APOE4' imparts a toxic 'gain-of-function,' then increasing apoE4 may increase soluble 'Aβ,' likely the proximal 'AD' neurotoxin. 'Forty-three' percent of 'OLTs' failed to increase 'GR' perioperatively under surgical stress.

60, 'Å', into, the, endosomal, lumen])]). relacion([sujeto(['Strikingly,', 'NPC1\'s', 'SSD', forms, a, cavity, that, is, accessible, from, both, the, luminal, bilayer, leaflet, and, the, endosomal, 'lumen;', computational, modeling]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, this, cavity, is, large, enough, to, accommodate, one, cholesterol, molecule])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', 'C', '(', 'NPC)', disease, is, an, autosomal, recessive, disorder, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, excessive, storage, of, cholesterol, and, other, lipids, in, late, endosomes, and, lysosomes])]). cholesterol, absorption, pathway]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, made, using, genetically, manipulated, mouse, models, and, agents, such, as, ezetimibe])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, the, lanosterol, cyclase, 'inhibitor,', 'Ro', 48, -, 8071, ',', when, fed, to, 'BALB/c', mice, in, a, chow, diet, '(', 20, 'mg/day/kg', body, 'weight),']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, in, the, serum, lipid, profile])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', the, present, review, aims, to, describe, and, discuss, the, potential, mechanisms, responsible, for, the, hypocholesterolaemic, effect, of]), verbo([regular]), complemento([consumption, of, probiotic, bacteria, and, yeast])]). relacion([sujeto(['Regarding', the, hypocholesterolaemic, effect, of, probiotic, 'bacteria,', the, potential, topology, of, 'NPC1L1']), verbo([provides]), complemento([necessary, information, for, further, dissecting, the, functions, of, the, different, domains, of, 'NPC1L1'])]). absorption, inhibitor, demonstrated, to, reduce, 'LDL-cholesterol', '(', 'LDL-C)', both, as, monotherapy, and, when, 'co-administered', with, 3, -, 'hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl', coenzyme, 'A', reductase, inhibitors, '(', 'statins)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', significant, interindividual, variability]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, observed, for, rates, of, intestinal, are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, an, improvement, in, response, to, ezetimibe, pharmacotherapy, and, suggest, that, detailed, analysis, of, genetic, variability, in, clinical, trial, cohorts, can, lead, to, improved, understanding, of, factors, contributing, to, variable, drug, response])]). relacion([sujeto(['Ezetimibe', is, a, novel, 'lipid-lowering', agent, that]), relacion([sujeto(['Appropriate', amounts, of, circular, template, 'DNA', and, biotinylated]), verbo([primer]), complemento(['DNA', were, used, for, rolling, circle, amplification, '(', 'RCA)', under, 'above-mentioned', amplification, 'factors,', the, current]), verbo([responded]), complemento([to, 'HE4', linearly, in, the, concentration, range, of, 3, -, 300, pM, under, optimal, detection, 'conditions,', with, a, detection, limit, of, 0.06, pM])]). relacion([sujeto(['Downstream', from, the, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([signal, 'peptide-coding', 'sequence,', the, 5, '\'', -, regions, contained, at, least, six, 'mini-exons', of, less, than, 50, nucleotides])]). relacion([sujeto(['Multiple', splice, variants]), verbo([involving]), complemento([these, 'mini-exons', were, protein, scission, had, occurred, within, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['GPS-motif'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Deglycosylation', experiments, showed, that, the, large, ectosubunits, were, complemento([been, shown, to, be, important, both, in, conferring, buoyant, lift, and, as, a, caloric, resource, for, energy, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', work]), verbo([has]), complemento([established, that, the, aerobic, energy, metabolism, of, 'Antarctic', fish, is, fueled, predominantly, by, the, catabolism, of, fatty, 'acids,', with, the, catabolic, machinery, relacion([sujeto(['Polyunsaturated', species, of, triacylglycerols, '(', 'TAGs)', containing, 18, :, 2, or, 20, :, 4, depressed, rates, of, oleate]), verbo([release]), complemento([by, 70, -, 75, '%', below, control, values])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', oleate]), verbo([release]), complemento([from, triolein, was, actually, stimulated, '(', by, 2, -, 4, -, 'fold)', by, both, saturated, species, of, 'TAG', '(', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, the, substrate, specificity, of, adipose, tissue, 'HSL', may, be, an, important, factor, in, determining, which, fatty, acids, are, mobilized, during]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([lipolysis, and, which, are, made, available, for, catabolism, by, other, tissues, of, 'Antarctic', fishes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data, further]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'TAGs', containing, some, saturated, fatty, acids, may, be, sufficiently, poor, substrates, for, catabolism, by, 'HSL', to, explain, their, disproportionate, accumulation, in, adipose, tissue])]). relacion([sujeto(['Such', a, mechanism, could, also, contribute, to, the, ontogenetic, accumulation, of, fats, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, as, an, underlying, basis, for, the, positive, correlation, of, buoyancy, with, increasing, body, mass, in, this, group])]). relacion([sujeto(['Preincubation', of, macrophages, with, dexamethasone, for, a, period, of, 16, -, 20, h, resulted, in, a, reproducible]), verbo([increase]), complemento(['(', 3.5, -, 'fold)', in, lysosomal, proteostasis, and, enhanced, clearance, of, lysosomal, 'storage,', including, cholesterol, accumulation, in, 'Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C', '(', 'NPC)', cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', this, effect, was, not, observed, when, 'ML1', was, pharmacologically]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([or, genetically, deleted])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hence,', lysosomal, adaptation, to, environmental, cues, such, as, nutrient, levels]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['mTOR/TFEB-dependent,', 'lysosome-to-nucleus', regulation, of, lysosomal, 'ML1', channels, and, 'Ca(2+)', signaling])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', review]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, reappraisal, of, lipid, storage, and, lysosomal, enzymes, activities, in, 'tissues/cells', from, 'NPC', patients, and, animal, models])]). relacion([sujeto(['Post-lysosomal', cholesterol, trafficking, is, an, 'important,', but, poorly, understood, process, that, is, essential, to]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([lipid, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', type, 'C1', '(', 'NPC1),', an, integral, membrane, protein, on, the, limiting, membrane, of, late, 'endosome/lysosome', '(', 'LE/LY),', is, known, to, accept, cholesterol, from, 'NPC2', and, then]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([cholesterol, transport, from, 'LE/LY', to, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER)', and, plasma, membrane, in, a, 'vesicle-', or, 'oxysterol-binding', protein, '(', 'OSBP)-related', protein, 5, '(', 'ORP5)-dependent', manner])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, 'NPC1', gene, can, be]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, majority, of, 'NPC', 'patients,', who, accumulate, massive, amounts, of, cholesterol, and, other, lipids, in, the, 'LE/LY', due, to, a, defect, in, intracellular, lipid, trafficking])]). relacion([sujeto(['Atherosclerosis', is, the, pathological, basis, of, coronary, heart, 'disease,', one, of, the, major]), verbo([causes]), complemento([of, death, worldwide])]). relacion([sujeto(['NPC1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, play, a, critical, role, in, the, atherosclerotic, progression])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([summarized, the, role, of, 'NPC1', in, regulating, intracellular, cholesterol, trafficking, and, atherosclerosis])]). relacion([sujeto([')', 'Anionic', lipids]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([cholesterol, transfer, between, liposomes, while, 'SM', inhibits, 'it,', even, in, the, presence, of, anionic, transfer])]). relacion([sujeto(['Anionic', phospholipids, derived, from, the, plasma, membrane, '(', phosphatidylglycerol, and, phosphatidic, 'acid)']), verbo([stimulate]), complemento(['SM', and, also]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, incorporation, of, diacylglycerol, '(', 'DAG),', 'Cer,', and, free, fatty, acids, into, the, liposomal, membranes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', phosphatidylcholine, hydrolysis, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, incorporation, of, 'cholesterol,', 'Cer,', 'DAG,', 'monoacylglycerol,', and, fatty, acids])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'SM', degradation, by, 'ASM', is, required, for, physiological, secretion, of, cholesterol, from, the, late, endosomal, 'compartment,', and, is, a, key, 'accretion,', which, may]), verbo([cause]), complemento([gradual, 'neurodegeneration,', and, we, reveal, how, 'β-cyclodextrin,', a, potential, therapeutic, 'drug,', reverts, these, changes])]). that, 'WT', 'NPC2', promotes, 'vesicle-vesicle', interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', interactions, were, 'abrogated,', 'however,', by, mutations]), verbo([causing]), complemento([defective, sterol, transfer, properties])]). relacion([sujeto(['Molecular', modeling, shows, that, 'NPC2', is, highly, 'plastic,', with, several, intense, positively, charged, regions, across, the, surface, verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LCBP', could, be, used, as, a, functional, food, for, the, prevention, and, treatment, of, diseases, related, to, excessive, cholesterol, accumulation])]). relacion([sujeto(['Type', 2, diabetes, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, a, characteristic, dyslipidemia, that, may, exacerbate, cardiovascular, risk])]). relacion([sujeto(['The']), verbo([causes]), complemento(['of,', and, the, effects, of, new, antihyperglycemia, medications, 'on,', this, 'dyslipidemia,', are, under, investigation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', an, unexpected, reciprocal, 'manner,', lowering, 'LDL-cholesterol', with, statins, slightly]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, risk, of, diabetes])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', inverse, relationship, between, 'LDL-cholesterol', and, diabetes]), verbo([has]), complemento([now, been, confirmed, by, multiple, lines, of, evidence])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genetic', and, pharmacologic, evidence]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'HDL-cholesterol', may, also, be, inversely, associated, with, diabetes, risk])]). relacion([sujeto(['Regarding', the, effects, of, diabetes, on, 'lipoproteins,', new, evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, insulin, resistance, but, not, diabetes, per, se, may, explain, impaired, secretion, and, clearance, of, 'VLDL-triglycerides'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Weight', 'loss,', bariatric, 'surgery,', and, 'incretin-based', therapies, all, lower, 'triglycerides,', whereas, 'SGLT2', inhibitors, may, slightly]), verbo([increase]), complemento(['HDL-cholesterol', and, 'LDL-cholesterol'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', topic]), verbo([has]), complemento([important, implications, for, treating, type, 2, diabetes, and, cardiovascular, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'mice,', the, 'Niemann-Pick', type, 'C1', 'Like', 1, '(', 'NPC1L1)', gene, is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, intestine, and, complemento([not, been, well, studied])]). relacion([sujeto(['Insect', 'NPC1', genes, were, grouped, into, two, 'sister-clades,', 'NPC1a', and, 'NPC1b,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, likely, 'α-hydroxycholecalciferol', in, the, treatment, of, severe, vitamin, 'D', deficiency])]). relacion([sujeto(['Human', adenoviruses, '(', 'Ads)', generally]), verbo([cause]), complemento([mild, 'self-limiting', infections, but, can, lead, to, serious, disease, and, even, be, fatal, in, 'high-risk', 'individuals,', underscoring, the, importance, of, understanding, how, the, virus, counteracts, host, defense, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['First,', we, wished, to, determine, the, molecular, basis, of, cholesterol, homeostatic, responses]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, early, region, 3, membrane, protein, 'RIDα', via, its, direct, interaction, with, the, 'sterol-binding', protein, 'ORP1L,', a, member, of, the, evolutionarily, conserved, family, of, relacion([sujeto(['However,', unlike, 'NPC1,', 'RIDα', did, not, reconstitute, transport, to, endoplasmic, reticulum, pools, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['SREBP', transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['RIDα-induced', lipid, trafficking, also, attenuated, proinflammatory, signaling, by, 'Toll-like', receptor, 4, ',', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, central, role, in, 'Ad', pathogenesis, and, is, known, to, be, tightly, regulated, by, 'cholesterol-rich', '"', lipid, rafts])]). relacion([sujeto(['"', 'Collectively,', these, data, show, that, 'RIDα', immunity, to, adenovirus, in, endosomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['IMPORTANCE', 'Early', region, 3, proteins, encoded, by, human, adenoviruses, that, attenuate, 'immune-mediated', pathology]), gene, expression, was, reduced])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nonetheless,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, hepatic, 'ABCA1', expression, and, reverse, cholesterol, transport, were, approach]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, basic, strategy, for, further, analysis, of, the, epididymal, lipocalin, gene, regulation, and, flexible, control, of, epididymal, function])]). 'HOXBES2', exhibited, homology, to, the]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([61, -, amino, acid, homeodomain, region, of, the, 'HOXB2', homeoprotein])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', we]), highlights, the, functional, redundancy, often, exhibited, by, enzymes, involved, in, lipid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Statins', safely, lower, 'LDL', 'cholesterol,', but, novel, inhibitors, complemento([recently, been, linked, with, the, induction, of, a, cellular, antiviral, state])]). relacion([sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, that, the, expression, of, the, was, extended, to, a, 'non-mammalian', species, for, the, first, 'time,', and, dual, activity, that, both, protects, the, cells, and]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, virus, cannot, be, discarded])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cholesterol', 25, -, hydroxylase, '(', 'CH25H)']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, identified, as, a, host, restriction, factor, that, exerts, antiviral, negatively, regulate, the, surface, expression, of, the, 'Notch', receptor])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', studies, uncover, a, specific, role, for, xylose, in, the, regulation, of, the, 'Drosophila', 'Notch', 'signaling,', and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, previously, unrecognized, regulatory, role, for, 'EGF16-20', of, 'Notch'])]). relacion([sujeto(['LARGE-dependent', modification, enables, 'α-dystroglycan', '(', 'α-DG)', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, its, extracellular, matrix, ligands])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, 'LARGE', gene, and, several, others]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'O-mannosyl', glycan, synthesis, have, been, identified, in, congenital, and, 'limb-girdle', muscular, dystrophies, that, are, characterized, by, perturbed, 'acid,', thereby, generating, the, heteropolysaccharides, on, 'α-DG', that]), verbo([confer]), complemento([its, ligand, binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, 'LARGE', paralog, 'LARGE2', '(', also, referred, to, as, 'GYLTL1B)']), verbo([has]), complemento([likewise, been, shown, to, enhance, the, functional, modification, of, 'α-DG', in, cultured, 'cells,', its, enzymatic, activities, have, not, been, identified])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LARGE2', is, also, a, bifunctional, glycosyltransferase, and, compare, its, properties, with, those, of, 'LARGE'])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', means, of, a, 'high-performance', liquid, 'chromatography-based', enzymatic, 'assay,', we, demonstrate, that, like, 'LARGE,', 'LARGE2']), verbo([has]), complemento([xylosyltransferase, '(', 'Xyl-T)', and, glucuronyltransferase, '(', 'GlcA-T)', 'activities,', as, well, as, polymerizing, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), be]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, low, levels, until, the, need, arises, for, cell, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['How', temporal, and, spatial, trafficking, of, 'PA', affects, its]), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, in, the, different, cellular, compartments, is, not, fully, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, in, cancer, 'cells,', 'PA', cycles, back, and, forth, from, the, cellular, membrane, to, the, 'nucleus,', affecting, the, function, of, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF),', in, a, process, that, involves, 'PPARα/LXRα', 'Golgi', '(', 'RCAS', 'marker)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'PPARα/LXRα', form, heterodimers, that, bind, to, new, 'Responsive', 'Elements', '(', 'RE)', in, the, 'EGFR', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', 'PA']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['EGFR', 'expression,', a, role, compatible, with, the, mitogenic, ability, of, the, phospholipid])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', a, 'PLD+PA', combination, impedes]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'PPARα/LXRα', to, the, 'EGFR', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', if, 'PA', levels, inside, the, nucleus, reach, a, certain, threshold, '(', &, 'gt;100', 'nM)', 'PA', outcompetes, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, and, transcription, is, inhibited])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', new, signaling, function, of, 'PLD-PA']), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['EGFR', trafficking, and, biphasically, modulating, its, 'transcription,', could, explain, cell, proliferation, initiation, and, its, maintenance, in, cancer, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR),', a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, 'receptor,', is, an, essential, regulator, of, immune, responses])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, adverse, effects, of, these, conventional, 'LXR', agonists, in, elevating, liver, lipids]), verbo([have]), complemento([impeded, exploitation, of, this, intriguing, mechanism, for, chronic, therapy])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', treatment, with, 'LXR', agonists, dramatically]), 'LXRs)', α, and, β, are]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptors, able, to, bind, oxidative, forms, of, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, 'adult,', 'LXR', activation, by, the, regulatory, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein-1', '(', 'SREBP-1)', is, a, key, transcription, factor, that, regulates, lipogenesis, in, rodent, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Two', only, in, their, first, exon])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, regulatory, effects, of, 'SREBP-1', on, lipid, and, milk, fat, synthesis]), verbo([have]), complemento([received, much, attention, is, speeded, up, by, 'cap-1', 'RNA']), verbo([release]), complemento([and, 'nsp10/nsp16', complex, 'dissociation,', at, the, low, intracellular, 'SAH', concentration])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, mucosa, cells, and, the, canalicular, 'membrane,', and, they, resecrete, 'sterols,', especially, absorbed, plant, 'sterols,', back, into, the, intestinal, lumen, and, from, the, liver, into, bile])]). relacion([sujeto(['Defects', of, either, of, these, cotransporters]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, rare, inherited, disease, of, 'phytosterolemia,', which, is, clinically, defined, by, hyperabsorption, and, diminished, biliary, excretion, of, plant, sterols])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, recently, demonstrated, that, the, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1-Like', 1, '(', 'NPC1L1)', transporter, is, most, likely, responsible, for, the, transport, of, cholesterol, and, plant, sterols, from, the, brush, border, membrane, into, the, intestinal, mucosa])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mrp2', deficiency, resulted, in, lower, serum, levels, and, fecal, excretion, of, 'EZ', '(', 1.4, +, /, -, 0.4, versus, 3.1, +, /, -, 1.1, 'ng/ml;', 115, +, /, -, 48, versus, 361, +, /, -, 102, 'microg/day,', both, p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', whereas, serum, concentrations, of, 'GLUC', were, manyfold]), verbo([increased]), complemento([compared, with, wild, type, '(', 196, +, /, -, 76, versus, 23, +, /, -, 25, 'ng/ml;', p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', associated, with, elevated, renal, excretion, and, decreased, intestinal, clearance, '(', 7.8, +, /, -, 3.1, versus, 0.4, +, /, -, 0.4, 'microg/day,', p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ;, 0.3, +, /, -, 0.3, versus, 15, +, /, -, 17, 'ml/min;', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Disposition', of, 'EZ', may]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, additionally, influenced, by, hepatic, 'P-gp,', 'Mrp3,', and, 'Ugt1a1,', which, were, expressed, significantly, higher, in, 'Mrp2-deficient', rats])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mrp2', deficiency, in, rats, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, decreased, 'sterol-lowering', effect, of, 'ezetimibe,', obviously, caused, by, lower, intestinal, clearance, of, the, glucuronide, and, decreased, enterosystemic, and, enterohepatic, recycling, of, the, parent, ezetimibe, to, the, intestinal, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C', 1, -, like, 1, 'sterol-uptake', compartment])]). relacion([sujeto(['Dietary', 'ω-3', fatty, acids, are, known, to, possess, antilipidemic, 'properties,', which, could, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, activation, of, 'PPAR', family, transcription, factors])]). relacion([sujeto(['β-carotene', uptake, in, 'Caco-2/TC7', cells, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'EPA', '(', 'p\240\<\240\0'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Despite', unaltered, 'β-carotene', 'uptake,', both, 'DHA', and, 'PPARδ', agonists]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'NPC1L1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Further,', 'EPA', also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, expression, of, carnitine, palmitoyl, transferase, 1, 'A', '(', 'CPT1A)', 'expression,', a, 'PPARα', target, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'EPA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([inhibition, of, 'β-carotene', uptake, and, 'SR', 'B1', expression, were, abrogated, by, specific, 'PPARα', 'antagonist,', but, not, by, 'PPARδ', antagonist])]). relacion([sujeto(['EPA', and, 'PPARα', agonist, also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, basolateral, secretion, of, 'β-carotene', from, 'Caco-2', cells, grown, on, permeable, supports])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'EPA', inhibits, intestinal, 'β-carotene', absorption, by, down, regulation, of, 'SR', 'B1', expression, via, 'PPARα', dependent, mechanism, and, provide, an, evidence, for, dietary, modulation, of, intestinal, 'β-carotene', absorption])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, cyclic, 'AMP-responsive', 'element-binding', protein, 'H', '(', 'CREBH,', encoded, by, 'Creb3l3)', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, liver, and, small, intestine])]). relacion([sujeto(['Hepatic', 'CREBH', contributes, to, glucose, and, triglyceride, metabolism, by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([fibroblast, growth, factor, 21, '(', 'Fgf21)', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, intestinal, 'CREBH', overexpression, suppresses, cholesterol, 'absorption,', leading, to, reduced, plasma, 'cholesterol,', limited, hepatic, 'supply,', and, greater, excretion])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, 'Niemann-Pick', 'C1-like', 1, '(', 'Npc1l1),', a, 'rate-limiting', transporter]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([intestinal, cholesterol, 'absorption,', was, reduced, in, the, small, intestine, of, 'CREBH', 'Tg', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Promoter', assays, revealed, that, 'CREBH', directly]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['Npc1l1', expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['Intestinal', 'CREBH']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([dietary, cholesterol, flow, from, the, small, intestine, by, controlling, the, expression, of, multiple, intestinal, transporters])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', propose, that, intestinal, 'CREBH', could, be, a, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, hypercholesterolemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', survival, rate, of, children, with, acute, lymphoblastic, leukemia, '(', 'ALL)']), verbo([has]), complemento([increased, to, approximately, 90, '%', after, substantial, progress, in, 'risk-oriented', treatment, strategies])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([report]), complemento([outlines, the, background, characteristics, and, treatment, outcomes, of, 1033, children, with, 'ALL', treated, according, to, a, 'TCCSG', platform])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([fundamental, information, for, the, further, molecular, investigation, of, this, disease])]). relacion([sujeto(['First,', we, manually, curated, a, 'high-confidence', list, of, 90, genes, procedure, of, family, exomes, implicates, additional, genes, and, variants, in, the, pathogenesis, of, 'CHD,', which]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([themselves, for, functional, validation])]). investigated])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'JAK2', expression, is, significantly, correlated, to, 'PBX1', expression, in, human, clinical, specimen, and, 'PBX1', knockdown]), relacion([sujeto(['To', the, best, of, our, 'knowledge,', this, study, is, the, first, one, that, analyzed, the, direct, conversion, of, 'non-fibroblastic', cells, toward, iNs, and, iNSCs, and, we, small, cytoplasmic, 'loops--four', small, and, three, large, luminal, 'loops--one', of, which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, bind, ezetimibe])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', defined, topology, of, 'NPC1L1']), verbo([provides]), complemento([necessary, information, for, further, dissecting, the, functions, of, the, different, domains, of, 'NPC1L1'])]). are]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, an, improvement, in, response, to, ezetimibe, pharmacotherapy, and, suggest, that, detailed, analysis, of, genetic, variability, in, clinical, trial, 'absorption,', and, is, a, target, protein, for, ezetimibe])]). relacion([sujeto(['Human', 'NPC1L1', protein, is, predominantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'liver,', whereas, small, intestine, expression, is, only, about, 2, -, 4, '%', of, that, found, in, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'NPC1L1', expression, has, been, shown, to, protect, against, 'diet-induced', fatty, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['(', 1, ')', 'Does', ezetimibe, treatment, improve, fatty, liver, in, patients, with, hypercholesterolemia, or, the, 'properties?', '(', 2, ')', 'Does', ezetimibe, treatment, improve, insulin, sensitivity, in, fatty, liver, patients, with, the, metabolic, 'syndrome?', '(', 3, ')', 'How', about, the, effects, of, syndrome])]). relacion([sujeto(['Administration', of, 'beta-sitosterol', '(', 42, 'mg/kg', per, 'day)', for, 3, weeks, to, 8, -, 'month-old', male, 'LXRbeta-/-', mice, resulted, in, the, death, of, verbo([increased]), complemento([upon, 'beta-sitosterol', treatment])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, multiple, mechanisms, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'absorption,', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, human, liver, but, not, in, murine, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', plasma, cholesterol, levels]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, levels]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, 'L1-mice'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', expression, of, microsomal, triglyceride, transfer, protein, '(', 'MTP)', was, markedly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, 'L1-mice,', accompanied, by, the, reduced, protein, levels, of, forkhead, box, protein, 'O1', '(', 'FoxO1)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', changes, were, not, observed, in, mice, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([hepatic, de, novo, cholesterol, synthesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([data, from, a, large, cohort, of, 56, 'Czech', patients, with, 'NPC', diagnosed, over, a, period, of, 37, '\240\years'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Bone', marrow, smear, '(', 'BMS)', analyses]), verbo([have]), complemento([proved, to, be, a, very, specific, indicator, for, 'NPC', and, have, become, an, important, part, of, our, diagnostic, algorithm])]). relacion([sujeto(['Since', 2005, ',', more, and, more, patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, assessed, using, 'NPC1/NPC2', gene, sequencing])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'total,', 30, different, mutations, were, 'identified,', 14, of, which]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, confirmed, as, novel])]). relacion([sujeto(['Understanding', 'YS', functions, and, development, may]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, efficient, transfer, of, nutrients, and, optimize, embryo, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['To', identify, temporal, 'large-scale', patterns, of, gene, expression, and]), verbo([gain]), complemento([insights, into, processes, and, mechanisms, in, the, 'YS,', we, performed, a, transcriptome, study, of, the, 'YS', of, chick, embryos, on, embryonic, days, '(', 'E)', 'E13,', 'E15,', 'E17,', 'E19,', and, 'E21', '(', 'hatch)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', observed, a, cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([a, vast, array, of, lipoprotein, receptors, and, fatty, acid, transporters])]). relacion([sujeto(['Genes']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, complemento([towards, hatch])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also, observed, that, 'YS', epithelial, cells]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([high, levels, of, genes, coding, for, plasma, carrier, proteins, '(', 'ALB,', 'AFP,', 'LTF,', 'TTR),', normally, produced, by, the, liver])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, in, the, final, week, of, chick, embryonic, 'development,', the, 'YS', plays, different, roles, to, support, or, replace, the, functions, of, several, organs, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, yet, reached, their, full, functional, capacity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'YS']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, similar, functional, role, as, the, intestine, in, digestion, and, transport, of, 'nutrients,', the, liver, in, producing, plasma, carrier, proteins, and, coagulation, 'factors,', and, the, bone, marrow, in, synthesis, of, blood, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, neither, 'SPT', nor, 'TICS', are, affected, by, photobleaching, per, 'se,', but, the, transport, parameters, obtained, by, both, methods, are, sensitive, to, the, 'signal-to-noise', ratio])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', type, 'C', disease, '(', 'NPC)', is, a, 'devastating,', 'recessive,', inherited, disorder, that]), verbo([causes]), complemento([accumulation, of, cholesterol, and, other, lipids, in, late, endosomes, and, lysosomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['About', 95, '%', of, patients]), verbo([have]), complemento([mutations, in, 'NPC1,', a, large, polytopic, membrane, protein, that, is, normally, found, in, late, endosomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['More', than, 200, missense, mutations, in, 'NPC1']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, in, 'NPC', patients])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', disease, is, 'progressive,', typically]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, death, before, the, age, of, 20, 'years,', although, some, affected, individuals, live, well, into, adulthood])]). 'in\240\vivo'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Metabolomics', analysis, further]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CYP7A1', induction, not, only, decreased, hepatic, cholesterol, but, also, altered, phospholipid, and, sphingolipid, compositions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Collectively,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CYP7A1', induction, interferes, with, growth, factor, selectively]), verbo([induces]), complemento([hepatic, 'autophagy,', which, helps, improve, hepatocellular, integrity, and, metabolic, homeostasis])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', genetic, complemento([the, cholesterol, transport, via, abca1, and, apoE])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', 'HPβCD', monotherapy, additionally]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cholesterol, synthesis, as, between, membranes, by, a, mechanism, that, involves, 'protein-membrane', interactions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Notably,', these, mutants, were, also, unable, to]), verbo([promote]), sterol, transfer, properties])]). relacion([sujeto(['Molecular', modeling, shows, that, 'NPC2', is, highly, 'plastic,', with, several, intense, positively, charged, regions, across, the, surface, defective, metabolic, pathway])]). relacion([sujeto(['After', 'internalization,', 'LDL', cholesteryl, esters, are, hydrolyzed, to]), verbo([release]), complemento([free, 'cholesterol,', which, then, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Growing', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([suggested, that, nonvesicular, transport, is, critically, involved, in, the, 'post-endosomal', cholesterol, trafficking])]). relacion([sujeto(['Numerous', 'sterol-transfer', proteins, '(', 'STPs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, to, mediate, directional, cholesterol, transfer, at, membrane, contact, sites, '(', 'MCSs)', formed, between, 2, closely, apposed, organelles])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', a, recent, study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'lysosome-peroxisome', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, +, /, -, 10, '%', for, either, 'Pit-1', or, 'Zn-16', mRNAs, measured, in, characterized, murine, 'GHFT1-5', somatotroph, precursor, cells])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', cell, extracts, also, showed, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([abundance, of, both, 'Zn-16', and, 'Pit-1', mRNAs, when, compared, with, whole, pituitary, extracts])]). relacion([sujeto(['GH', mRNA, was, not, detected, in, dwarf, 'mice,', reduced, to, 1.3, '%', in, 'lit/lit', '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.005, ')', ',', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([to, 242, '%', in, 'GHRH-excess', mice, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Pit-1', mRNA, was, not, detected, in, dwarf, 'mice,', was, 2.9, '%', of, normal, in, 'lit/lit', '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.005, ')', 'mice,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([to, 200, '%', in, 'GHRH-excess', mice, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Prop-1', was, not, present, in, dwarf, 'mice,', was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([to, 1.4, '%', in, 'lit/lit', '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', ',', and, increased, to, 223, '%', in, 'GHRH-excess', mice, '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Altered', pituitary, mRNA, abundance, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([for, several, products, not, previously, 'measured,', or, thought, not, to, be, affected, by, these, expression])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, 'mechanism(s)', underlying, its]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([expression, and, its, function, in, endothelial, cells, remain, unknown])]). human, cell, lines])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'siRNA-induced', knockdown, of, 'MEF2C', abolished, the, stimulative, effect, of, 'VEGF', on, 'PRL-3', transcript, in, 'HUVEC,', indicating, that, the, copies]), verbo([has]), complemento([lethal, effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Niemann-Pick', disease, type, 'C1', is, a, lysosomal, storage, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, 'NPC1', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', corresponding, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([11, predicted, 'membrane-spanning', regions, and, contain, a, putative, 'sterol-sensing', 'AtNPC1-2,', 'respectively)']), verbo([have]), complemento([partially, redundant, functions, and, are, essential, for, plant, reproductive, viability, and, development])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', sphingoid, base, 'component)', in, the, hemizygous, 'double-mutant', population])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', the, central, nervous, 'system,', hypoxic, insults, could, result, in, 'low-density', 'NPC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', effects, are]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, the, selective, blockade, of, 'A2ARs', by, the, antagonist, 'ZM241385'])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'ERK1/2'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Finally,', 'CGS21680', reduces, cholesterol, accumulation, '(', 'Filipin', 'III', 'staining),', which, is, the, main, criterion, currently, used, for, identification, complemento([with, free, cholesterol])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, roles, of, 'NPC2', in, 'HSCs', activation, and, liver, fibrosis]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, explored, in, affects, free, cholesterol, metabolism, and]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['HSCs', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'NPC2', is, decreased, in, both, 'thioacetamide-', and, carbon, 'tetrachloride-induced', liver, fibrosis, tissues])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'NPC2', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, quiescent, 'HSCs,', but, its, activation, status, is, 'down-regulated'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'NPC2', in, 'HSC-T6', cells, resulted, in, marked]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, relacion([sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'NPC2', overexpression]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['TGF-β1-induced', 'HSCs', activation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', further, demonstrated, that, 'NPC2', complemento([a, neuroprotective, mechanism, that, attenuates, 'α-synuclein', 'neurotoxicity,', thereby, pointing, toward, regulation, of, neuronal, cholesterol, turnover, as, a, potential, 'obesity,', insulin, 'resistance,', and, stable, coronary, artery, disease, '(', 'CAD)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', there]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, no, previous, reports, regarding, the, effects, of, 'omentin-1', on, atherogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['Omentin-1', was, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, human, umbilical, vein, endothelial, 'cells,', differentiation, of, human, monocytes, into, macrophages])]). relacion([sujeto(['Omentin-1']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([oxidized, 'low-density', 'lipoprotein-induced', foam, cell, formation, complemento([been, identified, as, proteins, of, lipid, droplets, '(', 'LDs)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['LDAH', is]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, hydrolyze, cholesterol, esters, and, to, be, changes, to, ensure, an, optimal, environment, for, replication, and, the, production, of, viral, progenies])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'response,', the, host]), verbo([has]), complemento([developed, diverse, countermeasures, to, sense, and, limit, these, alterations, to, combat, viral, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['Interferons', are, cytokines, that]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, transcription, of, hundreds, of, 'interferon-stimulated', genes, '(', 'ISGs)', whose, products, are, key, players, in, the, innate, immune, response, to, viral, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', addition, to, their, direct]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, viral, 'components,', interferons, and, 'ISGs', exert, profound, effects, on, cellular, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([started, to, illuminate, on, the, specific, role, of, interferon, in, rewiring, cellular, metabolism, to, activate, immune, cells, and, limit, viral, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', review, reflects, on, our, current, understanding, of, the, complex, networking, that, occurs, between, the, virus, and, host, at, the, interface, of, cellular, 'metabolism,', with, a, focus, on, the, 'ISGs', in, 'particular,', 'cholesterol-25-hydroxylase', '(', 'CH25H),', 'spermidine/spermine', acetyltransferase, 1, '(', 'SAT1),', 'indoleamine-2,3-dioxygenase', '(', 'IDO1)', and, sterile, alpha, motif, and, 'histidine/aspartic', acid, 'domain-containing', protein, 1, '(', 'SAMHD1),', which, were, recently, discovered, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([specific, metabolic, events, and, consequently, deter, viral, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['CH25H', expression, have, not, been, fully, elucidated])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, determined, that, 'CH25H', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, mouse, liver, and, complemento([to, be, downregulated, in, metastatic, melanomas])]). relacion([sujeto([5, ',', which, is]), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, the, 'Beckwith-Wiedemann', syndrome, and, 'polydipsia,', 'polyuria,', weight]), verbo([loss]), complemento([and, hyperpyrexia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Also,']), verbo([he]), complemento([was, diagnosed, with, diabetes, mellitus, with, random, disease, nor, corneal, opacification, consistent, with, 'lecithin-cholesterol', acyltransferase, deficiency])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', believe, this, severe, drop, in, 'HDL-C', level, to, be, due, to, acute, inflammation]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, malaria])]). relacion([sujeto(['As', extreme, drops, in, 'HDL-C']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, to, be, associated, with, the, poorest, 'prognosis,', prospective, identification, of, 'HDL-C', and, prompt, clinical, liaison, may, be, of, benefit])]). relacion([sujeto(['Contrast', sensitivity, and, straylight, measurements, revealed, remarkably]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([visual, 'function,', despite, good, visual, acuity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', findings, from, this, case]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'OCT', is, useful, for, analyzing, the, clinical, features, of, 'FED,', and, that, the, quantitative, measurement, of, visual, function, furthers, the, understanding, of, 'vision-related', symptoms, in, 'FED,', despite, good, visual, acuity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Removal', of, cholesterol, from, the, vessel, wall, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([an, impact, on, the, size, and, composition, of, atherosclerotic, lesions])]). relacion([sujeto(['Anionic', phospholipids, or, liposome, vesicles, composed, of, a, lipid, bilayer, such, as, nanoliposomes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, suggested, as, treatments, for, dyslipidemia])]). relacion([sujeto(['Low-density', lipoprotein, receptor, knockout, mice, '(', 'Ldlr-/-', ')', were, fed, with, an, 'Ldlr-/-', mice, once, a, week, for, 4, weeks])]). relacion([sujeto(['Administration', of, nanoliposomes]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([markers, of, reverse, cholesterol, transport, '(', 'RCT)', and, increased, markers, of, plaque, stability, in, 'HFC-fed', 'Ldlr-/-', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['Reduced', cholesterol, accumulation, was, observed, in, the, liver, along, with, the, 'Cholesterol', 'Acyltransferase', activity, within, the, plasma, was, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, mice, receiving, nanoliposomes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Anionic', nanoliposome, into, 'ER'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Conversely,', 'LPCAT3', deficiency]), verbo([increased]), complemento([membrane, 'saturation,', reduced, nuclear, 'SREBP-1c', 'abundance,', and, blunted, the, 'Notch', 'signaling,', and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, previously, unrecognized, regulatory, role, for, 'EGF16-20', of, 'Notch'])]). relacion([sujeto(['LARGE-dependent', modification, enables, 'α-dystroglycan', '(', 'α-DG)', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, its, extracellular, matrix, ligands])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, 'LARGE', gene, and, several, others]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'O-mannosyl', glycan, synthesis, have, been, identified, in, congenital, and, 'limb-girdle', muscular, dystrophies, that, are, characterized, by, perturbed, 'acid,', thereby, generating, the, heteropolysaccharides, on, 'α-DG', that]), verbo([confer]), complemento([its, ligand, binding])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, 'LARGE', paralog, 'LARGE2', '(', also, referred, to, as, 'GYLTL1B)']), verbo([has]), complemento([likewise, been, shown, to, enhance, the, functional, modification, of, 'α-DG', in, cultured, 'cells,', its, enzymatic, activities, have, not, been, identified])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LARGE2', is, also, a, bifunctional, glycosyltransferase, and, compare, its, properties, with, those, of, 'LARGE'])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', means, of, a, 'high-performance', liquid, 'chromatography-based', enzymatic, 'assay,', we, demonstrate, that, like, 'LARGE,', 'LARGE2']), verbo([has]), complemento([xylosyltransferase, '(', 'Xyl-T)', and, glucuronyltransferase, '(', 'GlcA-T)', 'activities,', as, well, as, polymerizing, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LARGE', and, 'LARGE2', catalyze, the, same, glycosylation, reactions, for, the, functional, modification, of, 'α-DG,', but, that, they, have, different, biochemical, properties])]). relacion([sujeto(['XXT1', and, 'XXT2']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, been, shown, to, encode, 'XyG', 'α-1,6-xylosyltransferases,', while, knockout, mutants, of, a, 'third,', 'XXT5,', exhibit, decreased, 'XyG', 'content,', suggesting, a, similar, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', enzyme, activity, of, 'XXTs', was, investigated, using, recombinant, protein]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'E'])]). relacion([sujeto(['XyG', analysis, of, single, and, double, 'T-DNA', insertion, 'knockouts,', together, with, overexpression, of, 'GT34s', in, selected, mutant, 'lines,']), verbo([provided]), complemento([detailed, function, of, each, gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, activity, of, the, third, member, of, the, 'GT34', gene, family, '(', 'XXT4)', that, exhibits, xylosyltransferase, activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Overexpression', of, the, remaining, 'member,', 'XXT3,', was, able, to, restore, 'XyG', 0.02, ')'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento(['LARGE', as, the, first, known, modifier, of, plasma, 'antithrombin,', and, proposes, a, new, role, for, 'LARGE', in, modulating, extracellular, secretion, of, certain, glycoproteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Recent', studies, demonstrated, that, mutations, in, 'B3GNT1,', an, enzyme, proposed, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'poly-N-acetyllactosamine', 'synthesis,', were, causal, for, congenital, muscular, dystrophy, with, hypoglycosylation, of, 'α-dystroglycan', '(', secondary, 'dystroglycanopathies)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([this, enzyme, is, not, a, 'β-1,3-N-acetylglucosaminyltransferase', with, catalytic, activity, towards, 'β-galactose', but, rather, a, 'β-1,4-glucuronyltransferase,', designated, 'B4GAT1,', towards, both, 'α-', and, 'β-anomers', of, xylose])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'dual-activity', 'LARGE', enzyme, is, capable, of, extending, products, of, 'B4GAT1', and, we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([experimental, evidence, that, 'B4GAT1', is, the, priming, enzyme, for, 'LARGE'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', results, further, define, the, functional, 'O-mannosylated', glycan, structure, and, indicate, that, 'B4GAT1', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, initiation, of, the, 'LARGE-dependent', repeating, disaccharide, that, is, necessary, for, extracellular, matrix, protein, binding, to, 'O-mannosylated', 'α-dystroglycan', that, is, lacking, in, secondary, dystroglycanopathies])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', enzymatic, mechanism, that, governs, the, synthesis, of, the, xylan, backbone, 'polymer,', a, linear, chain, of, xylose, residues, connected, by, 'β-1,4', glycosidic, 'linkages,']), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, elusive])]). relacion([sujeto(['Xylan', is, a, major, constituent, of, many, kinds, of, plant, cell, 'walls,', and, genetic, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, multiple, genes, that, affect, xylan, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, an, 'IRX10', homolog, from, the, moss, 'Physcomitrella', patens, displays, robust, 'activity,', and, we, show, that, the, xylosidic, linkage, formed, is, a, 'β-1,4', 'linkage,', establishing, this, protein, as, a, xylan, 'β-1,4-xylosyltransferase'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([find]), complemento([lower, but, reproducible, xylan, xylosyltransferase, activity, with, 'A'])]). relacion([sujeto(['\240\thaliana', 'IRX10', and, with, a, homolog, from, the, dicot, plant, 'Plantago', 'ovata,', showing, that, xylan, xylosyltransferase, activity, is]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([over, large, evolutionary, distance, for, these, proteins])]). relacion([sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, 'LARGE', gene]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, congenital, muscular, dystrophy, '(', 'CMD)', patients, with, brain, abnormalities])]). relacion([sujeto(['LARGE-dependent', modification, of, 'α-dystroglycan', '(', 'α-DG)', with, these, polysaccharides, is, complemento([on, the, endogenous, enzymatic, activities, of, 'LARGE', and, 'LARGE2', in, mice, and, 'humans,', using, a, newly, developed, assay, for, 'GlcA-T', activity])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', show, that, normal, mouse, and, human, cultured, cells]), verbo([have]), complemento([endogenous, 'LARGE', 'GlcA-T,', and, that, this, activity, is, absent, in, cells, from, the, 'Large(myd)', '(', 'Large-deficient)', mouse, model, of, muscular, 'dystrophy,', as, well, as, in, cells, from, 'CMD', patients, with, mutations, in, the, 'LARGE', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['Notably,', 'GlcA-T', activity, is, 'substantial,', though, 'reduced,', in, the, kidneys, of, both, the, 'Large(myd)', and, 'Large2(-/-)', 'mice,', consistent, with, the, observation, of, 'α-DG/laminin']), verbo([binding]), complemento([in, these, contexts])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', study, is, the, first, to, test, 'LARGE', activity, in, samples, as, small, as, cryosections, 'and,', 'moreover,']), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, first, direct, evidence, that, not, only, 'LARGE,', but, also, 'LARGE2,', is, vital, to, effective, functional, modification, of, 'α-DG', in, vivo])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'paper,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([on, a, 'Polish', patient, with, 'DBQD2', who, presented, with, severe, short, stature, of, prenatal, 'onset,', joint, 'laxity,', psychomotor, retardation, and, multiple, radiological, abnormalities, including, short, 'metacarpals,', advanced, bone, age, and, exaggerated, trochanters])]). relacion([sujeto(['Endocrinological', examinations, revealed, that, 'sleep-induced', growth, hormone, '(', 'GH)']), verbo([release]), complemento([and, 'GH', peak, in, 'clonidine-', and, 'glucagon-induced', provocative, tests, as, well, as, 'insulin-like', growth, factor, 1, '(', 'IGF-1)', and, 'IGF-binding', 'protein-3', levels, were, all, markedly, 'decreased,', confirming, deficiency, of, 'GH', secretion])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', study, describes, the, first, case, of, 'DBQD2', resulting, from, compound, heterozygous, 'XYLT1', 'mutation,', expands, the, mutational, spectrum, of, the, disease, and]), verbo([provides]), complemento([evidence, that, the, severe, growth, retardation, and, microsomia, observed, in, 'DBQD2', patients, may, result, not, only, from, the, skeletal, dysplasia, itself, but, also, from, 'GH', and, 'IGF-1', deficiency])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', major, question, remaining, in, glycobiology, is, how, a, glycosyltransferase, '(', 'GT)', that]), verbo([retains]), complemento([the, anomeric, linkage, of, a, sugar, catalyzes, the, reaction])]). relacion([sujeto(['Xyloside', 'α-1,3-xylosyltransferase', '(', 'XXYLT1)', is, a]), verbo([retaining]), complemento(['GT', that, regulates, 'Notch', receptor, activation, by, adding, xylose, to, the, 'Notch', extracellular, domain])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here,', using, natural, acceptor, and, donor, substrates, and, active, 'Mus', musculus, 'XXYLT1,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, series, of, crystallographic, snapshots, along, the, 'reaction,', including, an, unprecedented, natural, and, competent, 'Michaelis', reaction, complex, for, retaining, enzymes])]). relacion([sujeto(['These', structures, strongly, support, the, 'SNi-like', reaction, as, the]), verbo([retaining]), complemento([mechanism, for, 'XXYLT1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', the, epidermal, growth, 'factor-like', repeat, acceptor, substrate, undergoes, a, large, conformational, change, upon]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, active, 'site,', providing, a, structural, basis, for, substrate, specificity])]). relacion([sujeto(['Our', improved, understanding, of, this]), verbo([retaining]), complemento([enzyme, will, accelerate, the, design, of, retaining, 'GT', inhibitors, that, can, modulate, 'Notch', activity, in, pathological, situations, in, which, 'Notch', dysregulation, is, known, to, cause, cancer, or, developmental, disorders])]). relacion([sujeto(['Affected', children, may, present, with, delay, or]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([of, gross, motor, development, together, with, joint, 'and/or', spinal, rigidity])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', main, 'CMD', 'subtypes,', grouped, by]), verbo([involved]), complemento([protein, function, and, gene, in, which, causative, allelic, variants, 'occur,', are, laminin, 'alpha-2', '(', 'merosin)', deficiency, '(', 'MDC1A),', collagen, 'VI-deficient', 'CMD,', the, dystroglycanopathies, '(', caused, by, mutation, of, 'POMT1,', 'POMT2,', 'FKTN,', 'FKRP,', 'LARGE1,', 'POMGNT1,', and, 'ISPD),', 'SELENON', '(', 'SEPN1)-related', 'CMD', '(', previously, known, as, rigid, spine, 'syndrome,', 'RSMD1)', and, 'LMNA-related', 'CMD', '(', 'L-CMD)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Several', less, known, 'CMD', subtypes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, in, a, limited, number, of, individuals])]). relacion([sujeto(['Cognitive', impairment, ranging, from, intellectual, disability, to, mild, cognitive, 'delay,', structural, brain, 'and/or', eye, 'abnormalities,', and, seizures, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([almost, exclusively, in, the, dystroglycanopathies, while, white, matter, abnormalities, without, major, cognitive, involvement, tend, to, be, seen, in, the, laminin, 'alpha-2-deficient', subtype])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', congenital, muscular, dystrophies, are, inherited, in, an, autosomal, recessive, manner, with, the, intellectual, disabilities, caused, by, mutation, or, deletion, of, 'ZEB2', gene])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', deletion, or, cytogenetic, abnormality]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, primarily, from, 'Europe,', 'Australia', and, the, 'United', 'States,', but, not, in, 'Korea'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, patient, with, characteristic, facial, features, of, 'MWS,', developmental, delay, and, spasticity])]). relacion([sujeto([3]), verbo([involving]), complemento([two, 'genes:', 'ZEB2', and, 'GTDC1'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Knowledge', about, the, most, striking, clinical, signs, and, implementation, of, effective, molecular, tests, like, microarray, could, significantly]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, detection, rate, of, new, cases, of, 'MWS', in, 'Korea'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', is, the, first]), verbo([reported]), complemento([case, of, 'MWS', in, 'Korea'])]). relacion([sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([potentially, elicits, the, nonsense, mRNA, to, degradation, by, 'NMD', '(', 'nonsense-mediated', mRNA, 'decay)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['For', normal, fertilization, in, 'mammals,', it, is, important, that, functionally, mature, sperm, are, motile, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, fully, formed, acrosome])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', 'glycosyltransferase-like', 'gene,', human, polypeptide, 'N-acetylgalactosaminyltransferase-like', protein, 5, '(', 'GALNTL5),', belongs, to, the, polypeptide, 'N-acetylgalactosamine-transferase', '(', 'pp-GalNAc-T)', gene, family, because, of, its]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([glycosyltransferase, 'domains,', but, it, uniquely, truncates, the, 'C-terminal', domain, and, is, expressed, exclusively, in, human, testis])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', glycosyltransferase, activity, of, the, human, 'GALNTL5', protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, identified, by, in, vitro, assay, thus, far])]). relacion([sujeto(['Using', mouse, 'Galntl5', 'ortholog,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, whether, 'GALNTL5', is, a, functional, molecule, in, spermatogenesis])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', system])]). relacion([sujeto(['By', comparing, the, protein, compositions, of, sperm, from, infertile, 'males,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([a, deletion, mutation, of, the, exon, of, human, 'GALNTL5', gene, in, a, patient, with, asthenozoospermia])]). relacion([sujeto(['This', strongly]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, genetic, mutation, of, human, 'GALNTL5', results, in, male, infertility, with, the, reduction, of, sperm, motility, and, that, 'GALNTL5', is, a, functional, molecule, essential, for, mammalian, sperm, formation])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['H3', poxvirus, protein, is, a, major, target, of, the, human, antibody, response, against, poxviruses, and, is, likely, a, key, contributor, to, protection, against, infection])]). relacion([sujeto(['Like', 'glycosyltransferases,', 'H3']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['UDP-glucose,', as, shown, by, saturation, transfer, difference, '(', 'STD)', nuclear, magnetic, resonance, '(', 'NMR)', 'spectroscopy,', and, this, binding, requires, 'Mg(2+)', 'Mutation', of, the, 'glycosyltransferase-like', metal, ion, binding, motif, in, 'H3', greatly, diminished, its, binding, to, 'UDP-glucose'])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([by, flow, cytometry, that, 'H3', binds, to, the, surface, of, human, cells, but, does, not, bind, well, to, cells, that, are, deficient, in, surface, glycosaminoglycans])]). relacion([sujeto(['STD', 'NMR', experiments, using, a, heparin, sulfate, decasaccharide, confirmed, that, 'H3']), verbo([binds]), complemento([heparin, sulfate])]). relacion([sujeto(['We', propose, that, a, surface, of, 'H3', with, an, excess, positive, charge, may, be, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, for, heparin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Heparin']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, glycosyltransferase, activity, may, be, involved, in, the, function, of, 'H3', in, the, poxvirus, life, cycle])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', smallpox, vaccine, using, vaccinia, virus]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, highly, 'successful,', but, it, is, still, unclear, why, the, vaccine, is, so, effective])]). relacion([sujeto(['Studying', the, antigens, that, the, immune, system]), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([may, allow, a, better, understanding, of, how, the, vaccine, elicits, immunity, and, how, improved, vaccines, can, be, developed])]). relacion([sujeto(['Poxvirus', protein, 'H3', is, a, major]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, the, immune, system])]). complemento([comparative, biochemical, and, kinetic, studies, using, recombinant, 'OtsA,', 'VldE,', and, their, chimeric, proteins, with, 'a\240\variety', of, sugar, and, pseudosugar, substrates])]). for, proper, insulin, production, in, pancreas])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, glucose, induces, transcription, via, the, 'LXRB', gene, serum, responsive, factor, '(', 'SRF)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', mutation, of, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, or, siRNA, knockdown, of, 'SRF', and, 'Elk1', significantly, profound, roles, in, fetal, programming, and, adult, regulation, of, glucolipid, metabolism])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, overview, on, the, involving, disrupted, glucose, and, lipid, homeostasis, in, human, and, animals])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', intracellular, concentration, of, the, mitogen, phosphatidic, acid, '(', 'PA)', must, be]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, low, levels, until, the, need, arises, for, cell, proliferation])]). relacion([sujeto(['How', temporal, and, spatial, trafficking, of, 'PA', affects, its]), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, in, the, different, cellular, compartments, is, not, fully, understood])]). relacion([sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, in, cancer, 'cells,', 'PA', cycles, back, and, forth, from, the, cellular, membrane, to, the, 'nucleus,', affecting, the, function, of, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF),', in, a, process, that, involves, 'PPARα/LXRα', in, the, 'EGFR', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Nuclear', 'PA']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['EGFR', 'expression,', a, role, compatible, with, the, mitogenic, ability, of, the, phospholipid])]). relacion([sujeto(['However,', a, 'PLD+PA', combination, impedes]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'PPARα/LXRα', to, the, 'EGFR', promoter])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', if, mechanisms])]). relacion([sujeto(['Apart', from, the, well, known, systemic, 'RAS,', occurrence, of, a, local, 'RAS']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, documented, in, multiple, 'tissues,', including, the, kidney])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', large, body, of, recent, evidence, from, pharmacologic, and, genetic, 'studies,', particularly, those, using, various, transgenic, approaches, to, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'PXR', expression, levels, and, 'ligand-dependent', activation, of, 'PXR', and, 'LXR', increase, hepatic, 'SMPDL3A', 'levels,', which, possibly, connects, restored, by, administration, of, xenoestrogens])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previous', data, demonstrate, that, bexarotene, '(', 'Bex),', retinoid, 'X', receptor, '(', 'RXR)', 'agonist,', reduces, '(', 'apoE)', or, increasing, 'ABCA1/ABCG1-induced', apoE, lipoprotein, 'association/lipidation'])]). relacion([sujeto(['If', 'APOE4', imparts, a, toxic, 'gain-of-function,', then]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([apoE4, may, increase, soluble, 'Aβ,', likely, the, proximal, 'AD', neurotoxin])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', novel, 'EFAD-Tg', mice, '(', overexpressing, 'h-Aβ42', with, 'h-APOE),', levels, of, soluble, 'Aβ', '(', 'Aβ42', and, oligomeric, 'Aβ)', are, highest, in, 'E4FAD', hippocampus, '(', 'HP)', &, 'gt;', 'E3FAD-HP', &, 'gt;', 'E4FAD', cortex, '(', 'CX)', &, 'gt;', 'E3FAD-CX,', whereas, levels, of, 'lipoprotein-associated/lipidated', apoE]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, opposite, pattern, '(', 6, 'months)'])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'E4FAD-HP,', hepatomegaly])]). relacion([sujeto(['Thus,', 'RXR', agonists, address, the, 'loss-of-function']), verbo([associated]), complemento([with, 'APOE4', and, exacerbated, by, 'Aβ', 'pathology,', i])]). relacion([sujeto(['Liver', 'X', receptors, '(', 'LXR)', are, deemed, as, potential, drug]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'atherosclerosis,', whereas, a, role, in, adipose, tissue, expansion, and, its, relation, to, insulin, sensitivity, remains, unclear])]). relacion([sujeto(['Increased', adipocyte, apoptosis, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, epididymal, fat, of, 'T0901317-treated', 'HFD', mice])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'T0901317', treatment]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([basal, 'lipolysis,', but, blunted, the, 'anti-lipolytic', action, of, insulin])]). relacion([sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'LXR', activation, antagonised, 'PPARγ']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, in, epididymal, fat, and, 'PPARγ-PPRE-binding', activity, in, 3, 'T3-L1', adipocytes])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', the, glucose, tolerance, was, comparable, to, that, in, 'HFD', 'mice,', the, insulin, response, during, 'IPGTT', was, significantly, higher, and, the, insulin, tolerance, was, significantly, impaired, in, 'T0901317-treated', 'HFD', 'mice,', indicating]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([insulin, sensitivity, by, 'T0901317', 'administration,', and, which, was, further, supported, by, impaired, insulin, signalling, found, in, epididymal, fat, and, decreased, 'insulin-induced', glucose, uptake, in, 3, 'T3-L1', adipocytes, by, 'T0901317', administration])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', these, findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'LXR', activation, impairs, adipose, expansion, by, increasing, adipocyte, 'apoptosis,', lipolysis, and, antagonising, 'PPARγ-mediated', transcriptional, 'activity,', which, contributes, to, decreased, insulin, sensitivity, in, whole, body])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', potential, of, 'LXR', activation, being, a, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, atherosclerosis, might, be, limited, by, the, possibility, of, exacerbating, insulin, resistance])]). to, reduce, cholesterol, levels, also]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, frequency, of, sIPSCs])]). relacion([sujeto(['HD', mice, fed, the, 'KD', lost, weight, more, 'gradually,', performed, metabolism, represents, a, potential]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, therapeutic, intervention, in, 'HD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Modifying', cholesterol, or, ketone, levels, acutely, in, the, brain, can, partially, rescue, synaptic, 'alterations,', and, the, 'KD', can]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([weight, loss, and, improve, some, behavioral, abnormalities])]). complemento(['GR', perioperatively, under, surgical, stress])]). relacion([sujeto(['rhRLX-induced', 'GR']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([hepatocyte, 'high-mobility', group, box, 1, '(', 'HMGB1)', attenuated, 'neutrophil/macrophage', accumulation, in, 'OLT'])]). relacion([sujeto(['Alzheimer\'s', disease, '(', 'AD)', is, characterized, by, an, extensive, accumulation, of, 'amyloid-β', '(', 'Aβ)', 'peptide,', which]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([a, set, of, deleterious, 'processes,', including, synaptic, 'dysfunction,', 'inflammation,', and, neuronal, 'injury,', leading, to, neuronal, loss, and, cognitive, impairment])]). relacion([sujeto(['A', large, body, of, evidence, supports, that]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, '(', 'NR)', activation, could, be, a, promising, therapeutic, approach, for, 'AD'])]). relacion([sujeto(['NRs', are, 'ligand-activated', transcription, factors, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([gene, expression, and, have, cell, 'type-specific', effects])]). relacion([sujeto(['Moreover,', we, summarize, studies]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, the, last, 10, -, 15, years, and, their, major, outcomes, arising, from, the, pharmacological, targeting, of, 'NRs', in, 'AD', animal, models])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', dissection, of, the, pathways]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'NRs', in, the, context, of, 'AD', is, of, importance, in, identifying, novel, and, effective, therapeutic, strategies])]). relacion([sujeto(['Previously,', we, showed, that, changes, in]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([estrogen, receptor, '(', 'NER)', concentrations, within, large, dissections, of, the, preoptic, area, and, hypothalamus, of, pregnant, rats, might, underlie, changes, in, both, maternal, and, sexual, behaviors])]). relacion([sujeto(['Although', a, different, pattern, of, change, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, each, 'nucleus,', 'NER', levels, in, most, preoptic, area, nuclei, were, significantly, higher, by, the, 16, th, day, of, pregnancy, compared, to, those, on, day, 8, ',', while, receptor, levels, in, most, hypothalamic, nuclei, did, not, increase, until, day, 22, of, pregnancy])]). relacion([sujeto(['The', higher, 'NER', levels]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, preoptic, area, nuclei, of, female, rats, as, pregnancy, advances, can, be, correlated, with, growing, maternal, responsiveness, during, 'pregnancy,', while, elevated, concentrations, of, 'NER', in, hypothalamic, nuclei, at, the, end, of, pregnancy, may, indicate, preparation, for, postpartum, estrus])]). relacion([sujeto(['While', male, rats]), verbo([respond]), complemento([with, an, early, '(', 10, -, 12, 'h)', increase, in, 'LH', after, 'orchidectomy,', a, delayed, response, '(', 2, -, 3, 'days)', is, recorded, after, ovariectomy])]). relacion([sujeto(['In', this, study, we, tested, the, hypothesis, that, the, delayed, response, to, gonadectomy, in, the, 'E2-treated', males, is, due, to, a, more, prolonged, retention, of, 'E2', '(', when, compared, with, the, corresponding, male, feedback, 'signal,', 'testosterone)', within, specific, central]), verbo([nuclear]),
